message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $200 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $180? I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for the value you're getting.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
